title: Bloomberg Markets: Irma Could Cause $300 Billion in Damage
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Irma Could Cause $300 Billion in Damage
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Brian Sullivan\u0010Energy and Commodities Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing the path of Hurricane Irma. Jonathan Adams, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Insurance Industry Analyst, participates in the conversation to discuss Irma's impact on the insurance industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
